H3.text: who voiced simba in the lion king 2. Matthew Broderick

A4.text: Matthew Broderick as Simba, King of the Pride Lands, Mufasa and Sarabi's son, Scar's nephew, Nala's mate, and Kiara's father.

A5.text: James Earl Jones as Mufasa, Simba's late father, Kiara's grandfather, Nala's father-in-law, Scar's brother, and the previous King of the Pride Lands.
